Description: Large 3-bed/1.5-bath apartment for rent in South Medford. Short 15-minute walk to new Tufts Green Line T Stop with easy access to Rt 93. Living and dining rooms with hardwood floors throughout. Eat-in kitchen with stainless steel appliances, gas stove, dishwasher and fridge. Three well-sized bedrooms. Finished basement space. Private back porch plus shared yard. Washer/dryer in-unit. Tandem parking for three (3) cars. No pets please. Available 9/1. First, security and brokers.
